H-002.fix: Added tenant validation to api_keys, approvals handlers

H-004.fix: Added regex validation for container names

H-005.fix: Added authentication requirement to SSE endpoint

M-003.fix: Added migration deadline (2025-03-01) with rejection after deadline

M-004.fix: False positive - codebase uses httpx, not aiohttp

M-005.fix: False positive - Jinja2 is only a transitive dependency, not directly used
